detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the top and sleeve-ends.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels with a buttonhole and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, long sleeves with an adjustable tab and buckle at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks.
Cotton trousers, one pair in twill and one pair in denim, with an elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly and fake pockets. The cotton content of the trousers is partly recycled and partly organic.
Wide jumper in a soft mohair-blend knit with a turtleneck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Suit trousers in stretch twill containing some wool with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, fly with visible buttons, side pockets and short legs with a frill trim at the hems.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy cotton weave with appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck with a lace trim at the top and adjustable spaghetti straps.
Flannel shirt in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.

Straight-style blouse in airy, softly draping, textured-knit jersey with a stand-up collar and cut-out section at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.
A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. A pair of coral-shaped clip earrings made partly from recycled metal decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elasticated waist with a twisted, tasselled drawstring, side pockets and scalloped hems. Cotton poplin lining.
Patterned bracelet. Size 2.3x21 cm.

Dress in patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, smocked yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam at the waist and long sleeves with smocking at the top and wide smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping viscose satin with a sheen. High waist with concealed elastication and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Detachable elastic braces.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and narrow trim around the neckline.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with twisted seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Fitted maxi dress in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads with a deep V-neck and wrapover front. Long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist, and a concealed zip and high slit at the back. Lined.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sandals with fabric straps, a hook and loop fastening at the front and around the heels and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative, textured stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt with fabric flowers. Lined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and wide drawstring sides. High cut with gathered seams at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Set with a jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, raglan sleeves and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist. The polyester content of the set is recycled.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Rib-knit hat containing some wool with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft pointelle jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable, imitation leather tab with a metal fastener at the back.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Scarf in a wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 180x30 cm.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Straight-style, V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sport-inspired, ankle-length tights in jersey with a sheen and a contrasting colour print. Regular waist with a wide waistband.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a zip fly and buttons. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.

Pyjama top and shorts in softly draping satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Shorts with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and wide legs.

Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, gathered shoulder panels, covered buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton denim with an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides.
Wide, short top in soft organic cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Prolong the life of your favourite clothes. Mend, patch and continue to wear them. The patches can be ironed onto garments.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in glittery jersey with an open back, deep V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps that turn into lacing at the back. Seam at the waist and straight legs.

Pyjamas with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes and an open chest pocket. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and cut-out section at the front.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in woven fabric made from a silk blend with a collar, pleats at the top and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a narrow tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Low-waist briefs in mesh with glittery threads. Lined gusset.
Metal hoop earrings. One smooth pair, one pair decorated with sparkly stones and one pair decorated with different-coloured plastic beads. Diameter 1.5 cm and 2 cm.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Short dress in crinkled chiffon with lace details. V-neck with lacing at the back, long sleeves with ties at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Partly lined.

Padded bomber jacket with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, and print and embroidered motifs on the back, front and sleeves. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, and fake back pockets.
Long earrings in wide metal snake chain. Length 14.5 cm.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour details. Regular fit.
Cap in a cotton weave with a practical flap at the back to protect the ears and back of the neck.
Double-layered hat in a rib-knit wool blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué.
A-line skirt in slightly stretchy denim with side pockets and metal buttons down the front.
A-line dress in velour with a Peter Pan collar, long sleeves and press-studs at the back. Unlined.
Trenchcoat woven in a cotton blend for a small dog. Collar with a hook and loop fastening at the neck and underneath.
Long-sleeved top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front and small turtle neck. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton piqué.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly deeper neckline, chest pocket and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, buttons at the sides. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft cashmere weave with fringes along the short sides.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and tie detail at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and a jersey-lined hood with appliqués around the edge. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
